benchmark_details.name: ACE-2005-PT (Corpus for Event Extraction in Portuguese)
benchmark_details.overview: ACE-2005-PT is a corpus created by translating the ACE-2005 corpus into Portuguese, including European and Brazilian variants, designed to enhance event extraction for the Portuguese language.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a valuable benchmark for evaluating event extraction systems in Portuguese.

data.annotation: Automated translation and annotation alignment pipeline

methodology.calculation: Relaxed score of 87.77% and an exact score of 70.55% based on manual alignments by a linguist expert.
methodology.interpretation: Higher relaxed score indicates more successful matching overall, while exact match shows stricter criteria.
methodology.validation: Manual evaluations on a test set of ACE-2005-PT by expert linguists.
